amendment.description: An amendment numbered 23 printed in Part B of House Report 115-711 to strike $190 million for the licensing of the nuclear waste depository at Yucca Mountain.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kihuen amendment (A021) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. Kihuen.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Kihuen amendment (A021) Failed by voice vote.
